commit message: Fixes #137 by better matching the specific URL for a self-hosted blog when seeking the stats blog ID
fixes #124 and #138, this is also fixed server side in WP 3.2

Fix for viewing draft w/ Japanese characters, reported: http://androiddevel.wordpress.com/2011/05/18/hi-dan-i-use-your-app-to-write/

Uses solution from http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=3552
Wrapped a scroller around the signup view because of a certain device that uses virtual buttons instead of hardware buttons, making it impossible to select the bottom button
Created Blog class for better encapsulation, less re-used code.
updated to use blog model
updated to use blog model
Initial commit of Blog and Post class, makes things a lot easier for accessing blog/post data throughout the app.  Needs loads more testing/fixes.
removed some test code.
null check for postid on new post.
post upload/draft saving fixes, formatted xml files and moved the cwac thumbnail jars based on recommendations from #142
commiting patch from #144
Applied patch from #145, and cleaned up filenames and organization of files in the project for easier navigation around the source. Also capitalized file names.
don't delete posts in the local db when refreshing, instead attempt to update them first.
Added back 'load more' functionality in posts/pages
more model fixes, removed image helper subclasses because of no need for api v3 any longer
adding patch for #149, also removed the cupcake specific code block since we are moving to donut as minimum sdk
Fixes post preview.
Fixes categories.
fixes deleting posts
only allow network save for uploaded posts
cleanup patch from #153. Props lytsing
fixes #152 by adding a scrollview to the welcome screen.
fixed draft issue when re-saving content
geotagging fixes.
check for null response when refreshing posts
First commit of 1.5 alpha, anirudh24seven's GSoC project
Fixed posting, used notifications to show the upload progress.
Fixes #157. Also removed the Splash Screen from the app. Those are so 2009.
Added full screen editor from Anirudh's repo
Modified files for QuickAction

Loads of changes:

- Updates to the Dashboard interface
- New WPTitleBar class to re-use for each view that uses the action bar interface
- Corrected the app blog ID (not wp blog id) to be an int instead of a string
- Bug fixes
ViewComments.java was incorrectly resolved as ViewDrafts.java in previous commit. Props anirudh24seven
Added support for post formats. Also changed the comment badge to use a subclass of TextView so that the animation I was previously using to rotate the badge would not show.
added a refresh button to the action bar, added first implementation of refresh action to ViewPosts.java
added a listener to WPTitleBar in order to update the comment badge on the dashboard when switching blogs
Added WP.com subscriptions and removed bottom bar from comments (added refresh button in action bar)
Reload blogs in the quick action bar after adding more blogs to the app.
Fixed quick action buttons
Removed unnecessary imports in a few files. Updated WPTitleBar to show blog names with special characters, properly.
Connected dashboard Picture and Video icons to the camera for posting
Added About page and linked it with the Dashboard.
Added app software version in About page
Blog name on title bar now leaves enough space for refresh and add icons, irrespective of blog name size
Stats can be viewed now. Still kind of buggy, though.
Adjusted height of moderation bar for comment section
Removed unnecessary white space from the top of View Stats page
Stats now look better after using similar code as that of the wordpress iOS app
Returning from fullscreen was not saving the text in the content box. Fixed the bug.
Added notifications slider at the bottom and modified about page buttons.
Modified View Stats
Dashboard now has Right Now pull up feature
Added modified R.java
Changed Video embeds for non-VideoPress blogs to the html5 <video> tag
loads of action bar changes to the new design/ui flow.
Posts/pages view working w/ action bar now
Got rid of the quickaction class and just used a hidden RelativeLayout instead, works better and uses less code. #winwin
stats view has new action bar, too!
Dashboard buttons added for mdpi and hdpi
Removed 'v4' references, updated major views to support toolbar dropdown when changing blog
deleting v4 folders
post upload progress added to notification. Fixed sharing content from media gallery.
Fixed edit post f/c
fixed up dashboard animations
Fixed link helper for honeycomb
Fixes crash when ' : ' was in content shared to WordPress from another app
(Facepalm) Just use a regex to replace the links
Changing version from 1.5 to 2.0
Added global refresh, moved comment refresh out to ApiHelper.java
experimenting with WP logo on dashboard
fixed rounded corners of dashboard buttons on honeycomb. Darkened wp logo on dashboard.
whoops, moving drawable-v11 folder to where it should be
moved v11 folder to v12, where it belongs
Updated ViewPost from 1.5.1, added string resources for dashboard icons
Formatting toolbar, Lots of fixes to editor, that probably created more problems :) Inline images in editor, enhanced media class and created DB table for storing media in a post.
Image upload fixes
Convert Comments to use Fragments for tablets. Thanks ADL London!
Fixed up image upload. You can now put images/text wherever you want in the post :)
don't escape html in the WPHtml class, that's taken care of later.
Fixed categories and a few tablet layouts
yet another categories fix.
Fixed a few video upload things
Image Captions!
Fixes #181
Fixed up a few things with image upload and temp files

don't add

tags to content
A few translation updates.
Lots of fun tablet updates, pages fixed.
remove unused file
use v2 of mobile reader
support for untitled posts in the detail view, tweaked layouts.
don't allow stuff behind the dashboard overlay to be tappable
support for more tag
Fixed f/c if no mt_text_more was added
made editor easier to back out of.
Fixes #192 by rebuilding the dashboard buttons when the device rotates.
Fixed Dashboard view to use new rotation methods.
Changing target to Gingerbread for Kindle Fire compatibility
stats fixes, including fix for #191
stats fixes, including fix for #191
More Tag fix
Fixed comment notifications.
Removed the 'upload now' button, so that the save button is always present and makes more sense to save/upload a post.  Local drafts are now set by selecting 'Local Draft' from the drop down.
If a blog does not have a title, use the blog url.
Fixed up post editor layout.
Fixes for image settings and a f/c if the blog has no comments
too many calls to refreshComments makes the app have a bad day.
better database management, new icons
Fixed f/c when navigating back from posts or comments when a network task was running.
Added way better gingerbread icons.
prevent null mt_text_more
Got rid of the weird 'obj' character that would show after an image tag.
Fix paragraph tag issue.
fix gap in dashboard buttons.
Updating icons, new size: 46x46px. _active for pressed/active state.
Fixed the more tag.
New alpha drop down arrow (size 22x14px)
added active states for action bar buttons
intercept taps when the dashboard is showing so user can't select stuff under the dashboard.
ignore bin folder
changed dashboard animation to simple fade in/out.
Updating icons, styles, comment badge
Fixed up the comment badge, it now overlaps correctly and it's easier to position the textview. Also fixed bug where comment count would change to 0 if you rotated the device.
a bunch more layout fixes across devices and DPI's. PITA to manage but necessary for device compatibility.
change mdpi xlarge to reference version, added new post/page menu to Posts.java
shouldn't have used 'normal' folder name, switched to mdpi
use mystery man for default avatar, identicons are kinda ugly.
switched to reader v2. Currently broken when tapping an article in the list.
Enabled the DOM storage on the Reader webView, so we can use the V2 of the mobile reader.
Adding Read icon, updating Dashboard/Reload icons
added 'About' screen, removed some unnecessary icons.
Fixed f/c when deleting a post or comment and then tapping one of the action buttons on the deleted post/comment
show a toast message if a .org user taps the Read button.
fix back button from not working properly if the reader was loaded without an internet connection.
Fixed WPCOM signup, cleaned up a few warning messages.
cleaned up remaining warning messages, removed a few unused files
Achievement unlocked: All target versions compatible, flexible dashboard layout across devices, with comment badge overlay.
correctly identify comment_badge_frame
Fixes #197
Fixes #196
Fixes hard coded labels on landscape dashboard.
Fixes trac #199
Hide dashboard after selecting an action, unless you're at the home screen. Fixes trac #201
Add action bar on settings screen for #204
better settings layout.
Additional stats protection against f/c
edited the view post icons a bit, added refresh icon back.
Fixed f/c when viewing post with unknown html tag.
Fixed up the post preview.
set background color to white for viewpost
fixed up problem where paragraph tags weren't added to post so line breaks were messed up.
pop out of the detail view if the blog changes in the title bar.
set up posts, settings and stats as singleTask activities, so you can't have more than one of each activity running at a time.
setting new version number
kill the network task/spinner if user performs an action on the post view.
Implemented a listener for when the post upload completes, so the post list will refresh if showing or will be queued to refresh the next time it is loaded.
removed unused attachment icon
fixed up draft migration, added alert dialog to posts/pages refresh failure.
removed upload post long press action.
notification fixes.
wp.me shortlink grabber fixed. Not perfect solution but the HTML parser was breaking before it got to the shortlink tag.
Fixes trac #207
need to set status of page drafts as well for migration.
make sure the password isn't null in migration.
.toString() be gone in null check.
Figrued out actual source of pages migration problem, wrong order of post object insertion.
Fixed f/c when switching from pages to posts view, bug in footer view switcher.
updating user agent for beta
Fixes trac #209
added some isFinishing() checks around the stats progress dialog to fix #208. The progress dialog probably isn't needed at all since we have the refresh button in the action bar now #todo.
should fix #210, not allow taps on the header rows.
Fixes #211
Fix up stats issues for #212. Also removed annoying progress dialog.  Stats display is run on ui thread... should be cleaned up.
Added new stats URL that we used in v 1.5.1.
Fixed f/c when sharing media to a post.
Add Kindle Fire (and other large mdpi devices) layouts for #229
Fixes #228
Fixes #227, there's actually no such post format as 'Standard', it means a post with no post format set.
Fixes trac #226 by escaping category names where displayed.
typo in strong tag, fixes #225
Fixes #221, check for null titleBar
Fixes #223
Fixed some hard coded strings, removed unused layout file.
Fixes #230
Fix for #177
Fixes #178
Fixes #215, although I'm not sure why the titleBar was null at that point.
added show() to Toast for no camera detected.
Fixed link helper to match our best friend, WordPress for iOS. Fixed up link placement when inserting images or a link.
Reverting SelectCategories.java back, unintended change was committed.
adding new method, forgot it in last commit.
Editor improvements.
Fix for formatting being applied when the spell checker tried to correct a word on backspace.
commenting out code for pasting text, seems to work fine without it.
Just kidding, that paste code is needed.
Should fix #218, the setContent() call needs to happen after the content view is set.
Change stats to use AsyncTask, fixes #217 as part of the change.
Updated translation files for many languages.
updated some translation strings.
Process the more tag for uploaded posts as well.
whoops, missing a bracket
Fixed more tag.
Added 'view post' button and functionality.
Date parse fix.
Fix for #214, problem was with Pending Review posts that don't return a date.
Fix for adding image wiping out content, reported at http://androiddevel.wordpress.com/2011/11/24/the-wordpress-for-android-2-0-beta-2-is/#comment-6391
Fixed photo/video captures from not showing in the content editor.
Added same dimens/styles from the root values folder to values-large-hdpi. This fixes the layout problems on the original Samsung Galaxy tab, which incorrectly identifies itself as an hdpi device.
Changed attachment paperclip icon to a camera icon, fixed reader from not loading properly when user has a self-hosted AND a dotcom blog.
Updated Swedish strings
updated layout files to wrap content of section 3 so that the post password would not get cut off if the pubDate wrapped to a new line.
Added Hebrew translation.
Tweaked the padding for the dashboard on tablets, to support devices with 1024x768 resolution.
made the save button full width for phones
Full width for edit page view save button as well
Float the save button to the right for tablets
page layout tweaks.
Format bar fixes, centers content better.
Fixed up a few bugs related to image upload.
return null if media file isn't found.
Moved where the message was updated in the upload notification, fixes the message from never changing from 'uploading media file #1'
Added title to EditPost.java, so you know which blog you are currently creating/editing a post on.
Created an mdpi version of the WP logo that shows in the action bar.
center the new account layout for hdpi devices.
Don't thread the load of the webview.
Added post status to the post/page list, tweaked icon size for qvga devices.
added 'Published' string.
Fix crash when adding image from Picasa
added wp icon for large mdpi devices
Added support for strikethrough to WPHtml
Editor tweaks, fixes tapping the autocorrect words that wouldn't apply styling correctly. Also wrapped formatting stuff in try/catch blocks in case something goes awry.
Saves comment reply in case the connection fails.
Touched up the Header text in the editor.
updated some translation strings.
Fixes f/c when sharing to WP that has no account.
String tweak for German
Don't output characters that aren't valid.
protect accessing string builder substring, sometimes the index position can cause trouble.
Better way of avoiding the 'obj' character.
Less grey, more blue. Also delayed showing of dashboard a bit on load.
Missed this file in last commit.
Fixes list highlight on older platforms
Removed content_bg 9 patch as it wasn't rendering correctly on ICS. Had to update layout files to new shape drawable version.
A few layout tweaks.
Don't process page/post title if coming from a share action.
Clear out the richPostContent when creating or editing a post.
Comment ribbon placement tweaks
Redraw the comments list after bulk moderating.
enough with this beta business.
enable hw acceleration, disable debugging.
updated version code to match up w/ amazon
Don't attempt to refresh posts after upload if we've left the activity. Reported at http://android.forums.wordpress.org/topic/latest-version-force-close-when-posting
unused import cleanup
check for null db or current blog objects in activities that don't have the wp title bar in them.
